title: MAPBM
description:
Federated architecture deployment of the MAPBM project (MAPBM 2.0). 
Maturity Assessment Model in PBM. Empowering hospitals to reduce unnecessary transfusions and improve patient outcomes. 
MAPBM is a collaborative network of hospitals dedicated to advancing the implementation of evidence-based Patient Blood Management (PBM) strategies into practice to drive better patient outcomes.
Three main working areas:
- Measuring & Benchmarking - evaluating PBM practices across hospitals using routinely collected hospital data.
- Community of Practice - PBM leads sharing experiences, knowledge, and solutions to promote continuous improvement.
- Generating Real-World Evidence (RWE) - producing scientific evidence on PBM to inform practice and policy.
